column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2019
column14: I have eczema and this product really works well for me. It is very moisturizing and it smells good. A little goes a long way and I have found it lasts longer than body wash you can get at the grocery store. Most importantly, it does not irritate my eczema. I can't say what it would do for other people with skin issues, so please do not generalize what I say to all people with eczema, psoriasis, etc. For me, this really works well.

column14: I am impressed with this Amazon brand shower product.  It is  creamy and moisturizing.  It is lightly scented which is great for someone like me who is sensitive to strong smells. column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
column14: I'm so glad that I finally discovered and bought this body wash. I was scared to give it a try but the price, 2-day delivery and ease of purchase compelled me when I ran out of body wash and didn't want to go to the grocery store just to buy body wash. This body wash cleans well, smells lovely and is hypoallergenic (which is a plus because I have sensitive skin). I'm thrilled with this purchase and give it my highest recommendation.
